attributes.title: MAGA
attributes.review: This app is a great way to be in the know about Trump, get friends and those on the fence about Trump to see what he is really about and stands for. The competitive edge is a bonus for me as well! I love this app. It's well worth the download!

attributes.title: YUUUGE
attributes.review:
Every Donald Trump supporter must have this app. Be part of history! Great tool for recruiting younger voters as well for older folks who like to have all their info in one place. Just doin my part to make sure Mr. Trump wins big in November. 

The 45th President of the United States of America Donald J Trump!

attributes.title: Small business owner
attributes.review: So glad to have an app specifically designed for our new POTUS! Love it and connecting with others!  Should be able to add more contacts daily :-)!

attributes.title: TopNotch ðŸš‚ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ðŸ’¨ MAGA
attributes.review: IT IS TOP NOTCH!! I'd like to see it replace fb all together... It's a great innovative beginning to a Trump Presidency! I love the app and think it's great to connect with more trump supporters from all over the country. Keep on pressing towards the goal. WinWinWin!! Winners Aren't Losers!!! MAGA God Bless America!!

attributes.title: Hello winners !!!
attributes.review:
This app is great and is worth checking out, for sure. Curious where Trump stands, what he believes in? Media doesn't want you to know, check out this app and find out now! 

It's fun too! Get involved! Such a great app.

attributes.title: MAGA! Sleek App. Easy to Use.
attributes.review:
Trump can't do this alone , get ALL you can registered to vote and aboard the Trump Train and VOTE . Let's win this election from the globalists who own corrupt and sick Hillary .
Use this app , check in daily and donate what you can to Trump.

attributes.title: Fantastic informative app
attributes.review: Can't get enough information. This app is filled with great stuff. Easily navigable. Great job Team Trump. You know how to get things done! Keep moving forward!

attributes.title: Great app! Make America great again!
attributes.review: Great way to stay up to date with the campaign. This country needs a change! A change for the better! Out with the crooked career politicians!  Hop on board the TrumpTrain!!!

attributes.title: Cool app to bring people together
attributes.review: This app is exciting! Taking social media into the hands of user and giving alternative options than what previously existed !

attributes.title: Keeps me connected
attributes.review: America First works well, is vital to receiving updates from the front lines and keeps me well-connected with the campaign.
